snippet: Paul Ryan acknowledged that he would fill a void on the ticket, serving as the energetic Beltway yin to Mitt Romney’s experienced corporate yang.
abstract: Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan's differences in background and style seem more pronounced than their similarities, but aides to Romney say that those distinctions are precisely what they consider part of Ryan's appeal.
lead_paragraph: Paul Ryan acknowledged that he would fill a void on the ticket, serving as the energetic Beltway yin to Mitt Romney’s experienced corporate yang.

headline.seo: Romney and Ryan Don’t Mind Their Contrasts
headline.main: In Romney and Ryan, a Pair Who Don’t Mind Their Differences
headline.print_headline: A Team That Seems Comfortable With the Contrasts
